column13:
Nioxin System 6 (33.8 oz) Price: Rs.11100

NIOXIN Cleanser System 6 is a Nioxin shampoo for medium to coarse non-chemically treated thinning hair. The Nioxin shampoo gently cleanses and removes environmental residue buildup such as DHT (Dihydrotestosterone). NIOXIN Cleanser System 6 is enriched with amino acids and vitamins. SmoothPlex promotes shine moisture and smoothness. Activ-Renewal is for a more youthful-looking scalp skin tone. Unique Scalp AccessTM delivery system helps protect nutrients that nurture the scalp and hair. Finally BioAmp is for adding thickness and strength to the hair. NIOXIN Scalp Therapy System 6 is a conditioner for medium to coarse non-chemically treated noticeably thinning hair. The NIOXIN system 6 conditioner moisturizes and energizes the scalp. The NIOXIN system 6 conditioner has SmoothPlex which provides moisture and natural shine. Activ-RenewalTM promotes more youthful-looking scalp while Unique Scalp AccessTM delivery system protects nutrients while they nourish the scalp and hair. NIOXIN Diamax with a fusion of Niacinamide Panthenol and Caffeine is proven to: 1. Increase the diameter of each existing hair strand. 2. Penetrate hair and make it fuller and more manageable. 3. Strenghten hair resilience against breakage. PRODUCT GUIDE Diamax is a leave-on treatment that can be used with the Nioxin 3-part systems for thicker denser-looking hair
